stages.objective1: Objective: Collect 0/25 Pass of Dimension from Black Ratz
stages.objective2: Objective: Collect 0/15 Pass of Dimension from Boxes
stages.objective3: Objective: Collect 0/32 Pass of Dimension from Bloctopus
stages.objective4: Objective: Collect 0/6 Pass of Dimension from Dark Eyes
stages.objective5: Objective: Collect 0/24 Pass of Dimension from boxes in 6 portals
stages.objective6: Objective: Jump to the top platform
stages.objective7: Objective: Collect 0/3 Pass of Dimension from Rombot
stages.tips2: Tip: The first group of players should break the second box from the top to enter the hidden map, then tell the rest of the teammates to enter the second stage.
stages.tips4: Suggestion: There are 5 portals, the top 3 are suitable for magic attack jobs, the bottom 2 are suitable for physical attack jobs. The last portal has two monsters.
stages.tips5: Suggestion: The top portal is suitable for mages, the bottom portal is suitable for thieves.
stages.tips8: There are 126 combinations, please watch the animation based on the jump method of your team
stages.warning1: Warning: Do not immediately go to the next stage after clearing the stage. Please let 1-2 players go to the next stage and enter the Hidden Room, then the rest of the players can enter.
stages.warning5: Warning: The bottommost portal requires a thief with stealth to enter, otherwise you will die when you are hit by a monster.
stages.warning7: Warning: This stage requires a range-attack job to hit monsters.

sealed.title: Sealed Room
sealed.solvePuzzle: Objective: Get 4 digits from the NPC and fill in the decoder, then let 4 players stand on the platform with correct number.
sealed.step1: 1. Try <color=#ff0000>NO one</color> standing on any platform to get <color=#ff0000>1st digit</color> from NPC.
sealed.step2: 2. Try <color=#ff0000>1 person standing on left</color> platform to get <color=#ff0000>2nd digit</color> from NPC.
sealed.step3: 3. Try <color=#ff0000>1 person standing on middle</color> platform to get <color=#ff0000>3rd digit</color> from NPC.
sealed.step4: 4. Try <color=#ff0000>1 person standing on right</color> platform to get <color=#ff0000>4th digit</color> from NPC.
sealed.enterCodeHint: Enter a 4-digit code using only numbers 0-2
sealed.invalidCode: Invalid code! This combination doesn't exist in the puzzle.
sealed.requirement2: Requires <color=#ff0000>4</color> players to stand on the platform according to the answer, then click NPC to complete the stage
sealed.requirement3: Get the Goddess Piece from the box at the top platform
sealed.tip: Warning: If you tested more than 7 tries, you will be send out of the room and the answer will be regenerated again

lobby.title: Lobby
lobby.collectCD: Objective: Find 0/1 {color} CD, click the CD player, then talk to NPC for the Goddess Piece
lobby.tip: Note: This stage requires a teleport skill to reach the platforms.

storage.title: Storage
storage.huntMobs: Objective: Hunt 0/15 Cellion in the following sequence
storage.tip: Note: The last Cellion will drop the Goddess Piece.

lounge.title: Lounge
lounge.collect40Pieces: Objective: Collect 0/40 Pieces, then talk to NPC for the Goddess Piece
lounge.collectPieces: Objective: Collect 0/10 Pieces on white platform
lounge.tip: Note: Count pieces before you jump down from a platform to ensure you have collected all pieces. Otherwise, you will have to restart the Party Quest.

walkway.title: Walkway
walkway.collectPieces: Objective: Collect 0/30 Pieces, then talk to NPC for the Goddess Piece
walkway.tip: Note: Count pieces before you jump down from a platform to ensure you have collected all pieces. Otherwise, you will have to restart the Party Quest.
walkway.jobRequirement: Requires AOE (Area of Effect) job type

onTheWayUp.title: On the way up
onTheWayUp.jumpToHighest: Objective: Jump to the top platform
onTheWayUp.tip: When you reach top for levers, answer is always 2 ↓ 3 ↑. Total of 10 possible answers.
onTheWayUp.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all selections?
onTheWayUp.requirement1: When a player reaches the top, the other can return to the bottom.
onTheWayUp.requirement2: The top will <color=#ff0000>configure levers</color> while the bottom <color=#ff0000>spams NPC to check for the answer</color>.
onTheWayUp.requirement3: After clearing the stage, remember to get the Goddess Piece from the box.

entrance.title: Entrance
entrance.tip: Tip: Do not climb ladders when completing the stage.

garden.title: Garden (Boss)
garden.objective1: After clearing mobs in the garden, <color=#ff0000>seeds</color> will drop
garden.objective2: Plant these seeds in the pots and find a <color=#ff0000>Dark Nependeath</color> and a <color=#ff0000>pot that cannot be planted</color>
garden.objective3: After killing the <color=#ff0000>Dark Nependeath</color>, the boss will appear
garden.objective4: After killing the boss, an <color=#ff0000>Even Stranger Seed</color> will drop, then plant this seed in the <color=#ff0000>pot that cannot grow Nependeath</color>
garden.objective5: After planting the seed, a <color=#ff0000>Life of Grass</color> will grow. Take the <color=#ff0000>Life of Grass</color> and return to <color=#ff0000>Central Tower</color> and place it in the middle of the <color=#ff0000>Statue</color> to complete the party quest
garden.tip: Note: If a pink Nependeath grows, do not kill it.

leaveRoom.title: Leave Room?
leaveRoom.message: Are you sure you want to leave this room? You'll need to rejoin if you want to return.

resetGrid.title: Reset All?
resetGrid.message: Are you sure you want to reset everything? This will clear all selections.

swapCell.title: Swap Positions?
swapCell.message: Do you want to swap positions with {color}?

errors.createRoomFailed: Failed to create room. Please try again later.
errors.joinRoomFailed: Failed to join room. This room does not exist or has expired.
errors.invalidRoomCode: Please enter a valid 6-digit room code
errors.roomRemoved: Room has been closed, please rejoin a new room
